```{r,echo=FALSE}
library(DT)
```

The original file passed in to the xDateR app was `r params$fileName`.

```{r,echo=FALSE}
rwl.report(params$rwlObject)
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
plot.rwl(params$rwlObject,plot.type = params$rwlPlotType)
```

```{r,echo=FALSE}
summary(params$rwlObject)
```
